pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# vs-scale### VapourSynth (de)scale functions
Wrappers for scaling and descaling functions.You can find support in the [IEW Discord server](https://discord.gg/qxTxVJGtst).

## How to installInstall `vsscale` with the following command:```sh$ pip install vsscale```Or if you want the latest git version, install it with this command:```sh$ pip install git+https://github.com/Irrational-Encoding-Wizardry/vs-scale.git```
